nodes.text: Green Leader  or Green One was the callsign attributed to the lead pilot of Green Squadron.

During the Massacre near Teralov, an individual who flew as Green Leader was killed. A different man flew as Green Leader at the Battle of Atollon, and another pilot served as Green Leader at the Battle of Scarif.

In 4 ABY during the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire, the human male Arvel Crynyd served as Green Leader during the climactic Battle of Endor until he was killed in a suicide run to destroy the Super Star Destroyer Executor.
Following the battle, the Duros male L'ulo L'ampar was given the title and command of the squadron.
Another man served as the leader of the Resistance's Green Squadron.
In "The Antilles Extraction," Green Leader was voiced by Steve Blum.
